dataList.name: Charmed
dataList.desc:
- All damage dealt to Fairy reduced to 0.
- Expires when Fairy dies.

dataList.name: Regenerate
dataList.desc: Number of Charmed Units +1 every time a part is restored

dataList.name: Protection Umbrella
Interlocking Time
dataList.desc: Reduce final damage by 30% and store it. At 3 Count, take fixed damage by 2 times the accumulated damage, and gain 3 Bind next turn.
dataList.summary: Reduce final damage by 30% and store it. At 3 Count, take fixed damage by 2 times the accumulated damage, and gain 3 Bind next turn.

dataList.name: Borrowed Time
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, gain 3 Haste, 2 Damage Up, and 2 Offense Level Up; If only 1 Count remains at the end of the turn, gain 3 Bind, 1 Attack Power Down, and 2 Fragile next turn
dataList.summary: At the end of the turn, gain 3 Haste, 2 Damage Up, and 2 Offense Level Up; If only 1 Count remains at the end of the turn, gain 3 Bind, 1 Attack Power Down, and 2 Fragile next turn

dataList.name: Reattached Curse Talisman
dataList.desc:
At 9+, gain 5 Bind at the start of the turn.
At 12+, gain 5 Attack Power Down at the start of the turn. (Max 12)
dataList.summary:
At 9+, gain 5 Bind at the start of the turn.
At 12+, gain 5 Attack Power Down at the start of the turn.

dataList.name: Entangled Curse Talisman
dataList.desc:
Deal +1% damage per Count
At 9+ Count, gain 2 Attack Power Down at turn start (Max 9)

dataList.name: Accumulated Past
dataList.desc:
This displays the Total Turns taken in the Refraction Railway.
The number goes up by 1 at the end of the turn.
Spent completely when body is broken.

dataList.name: Crown of Thorns
dataList.desc: Generates a Rose unit whose Affinity corresponds to the most-owned Skill Affinity of the target inflicted with this effect

dataList.name: Blooming Sin
dataList.desc:
At the end of the turn
- Gain 1 Count.
- {2} loses HP equal to 25% of Max HP.
- Lose 10% of {1} E.G.O resource.
- The Sign of Roses heals 5% of Max HP.

At 4 Count,
- {2} dies.
- Lose all of {1} E.G.O resource.

dataList.name: Drenched Sin
dataList.desc:
Gain Max HP by {0}%(E.G.O resource drained).

On Death
- Regain {0} of {1} E.G.O resource.
- {2} heals HP by (25% of Identity's Max HP x Blooming Sin Count at death).

dataList.desc:
